contentrichtext.text: {{Distinguish|Linearity}} {{wiktionary|linage|lineage|lineages}} '''Lineage''' may refer to: {{tocright}} == Science == * [[Lineage (anthropology)]] or [[kinship]], descent group that can demonstrate their common descent from an apical ancestor or a direct line of descent from an ancestor. * [[Lineage (evolution)]], group composed of species, taxa, or individuals related by descent from a common ancestor * [[Lineage (genetic)]] * [[Lineage markers]] == Gaming == * [[Lineage (series)]], a medieval fantasy massively multiplayer online role-playing game franchise ** [[Lineage (video game)|''Lineage'' (video game)]], the original 1998 game ** ''[[Lineage II]]'', a 2003 prequel to ''Lineage'' ** ''[[Lineage III]]'', an upcoming sequel to ''Lineage II'' *** [[Lineage Java Server]] * ''[[Kya: Dark Lineage]]'', game where the character finds out about her lineage * ''[[Assassin's Creed: Lineage]]'', a series of short films based on the ''[[Assassin's Creed II]]'' video game == Television == * [[Lineage (Angel)|"Lineage" (''Angel'')]], a 2003 episode of the television series ''Angel'' * [[Lineage (Smallville)|"Lineage" (''Smallville'')]], a 2002 episode of television series ''Smallville'' * [[Lineage (Star Trek: Voyager)|"Lineage" (''Star Trek: Voyager'')]], a 2001 episode of the television series ''Star Trek: Voyager'' * [[Lineage (Revenge)|"Lineage" (''Revenge'')]], a 2012 episode of the television series ''Revenge'' == Other fields == * [[Embraer Lineage]], business jet * [[Lineage (Buddhism)]], line of transmission of Buddhist teachers * Line of transmission of [[martial arts]] teachers and/or founders ==See also== * [[Clade]] * [[Provenance]] * [[Parampara]] {{disambiguation}}
